amendment.description: To provide that not less than $250,000 of the amount appropriated for Diplomatic and Consular Programs assistance shall be made available for the establishment and support of an office of a special envoy for Sudan.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3719 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3719 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S3940; text: CR S3940) To provide that not less than $250,000 of the amount appropriated for Diplomatic and Consular Programs assistance shall be made available for the establishment and support of an office of a special envoy for Sudan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3719 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Biden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3719 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
